name: Smart Cardz
overview: A Non-AGA conversion of Klondike deluxe for all Amiga owners to use that retains the ability to load and use other card graphics sets. It uses all the standard rules of Klondike solitaire. There are many additional card sets that can be downloaded. Some currently out are based around Star Trek, Star Wars, reptiles, heroines, faces, famous art, anime, mammals, dragons, Achilleos and even adult themes of various kinds. While the card sets are required to be available to the public domain, not all card sets contain only public domain images.
